column2: SELECT b.year, p.nameFirst, p.nameLast, b.hr, b.rank FROM (SELECT yearId AS year, playerId, SUM (hr) AS hr , RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY yearid ORDER BY SUM (hr) DESC) AS rank FROM baseball.batting b GROUP BY yearId, playerId) b JOIN baseball.players p ON p.playerid = b.playerid WHERE b.rank < = # ORDER BY b.year DESC, b.rank
